comment: It was a bad moment, I was very scared. I thought that I wouldn't be able to escape. For that reason, I decided to write this diary. At least, if I die someday, there will be a record of my history.
Today's flight was amazing! The weather was clear, and visibility was excellent. I enjoyed every moment in the sky.
A bit of turbulence due to the cloudy weather, but overall, it was a smooth flight. Looking forward to the next adventure.
